content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: As an initial offer, I have in mind a monthly price of 1450 Euros, Max. However, I'm open to negotiations, but remember, this apartment, with its prime location and modern design, is a highly-sought-after property. TERMINATE (Only negotiating the rental price in this given scenario)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
